extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Windows Systems and Applications
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the Windows systems and applications are affected by the vulnerabilities by referring to the vendor advisory.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Security Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Apply security updates as soon as possible, prioritizing vulnerabilities with high scores and publicly exposed assets.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is it possible to disable NTLM authentication?

extracted_playbook.title: Disable NTLM Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Disable NTLM authentication to mitigate the vulnerability CVE-2025-21308.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict NTLM: Outgoing NTLM Traffic to Remote Servers
extracted_playbook.description: Enable the 'Restrict NTLM: Outgoing NTLM traffic to remote servers' policy to mitigate the vulnerability CVE-2025-21308.

extracted_playbook.title: Set LmCompatabilityLvl to Maximum Value
extracted_playbook.description: Set the 'LmCompatabilityLvl' to its maximum value (5) for all machines to mitigate the vulnerability CVE-2025-21311.

extracted_playbook.title: Read Email Messages in Plain Text Format
extracted_playbook.description: Configure email clients to read email messages in plain text format to mitigate the vulnerability CVE-2025-21298. Note that this will impact the ability to read email messages in HTML format.

cve_id: Windows Operating Systems and Applications Vulnerabilities
